en: Peppa is waiting for her best friend, Suzy Sheep.
zh: 佩奇在等她最好的朋友，小羊苏茜。

en: Hello, Suzy!
Baaaa! Hello, Peppa.
Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa.
zh: 小羊苏茜来找佩奇玩了。

en: Peppa loves Suzy. Suzy loves Peppa.
zh: 佩奇喜欢苏茜。苏茜也喜欢佩奇。

en: They are best friends.
Peppa, why don't you and Suzy go and play in your bedroom?
zh: 佩奇，你为什么不与苏茜去你的卧室玩？

en: Yes, Mummy!
George wants to play, too.
Peppa and Suzy love playing in Peppa's bedroom.
zh: 佩奇和苏茜喜欢在佩奇的卧室玩。

en: So does George.
No, George.This game is just for big girls.
zh: 不行，乔治。这游戏只适合大女孩玩。

en: Go and play with your own toys.
zh: 你去玩你自己的玩具吧。

en: Peppa and Suzy want to play on their own.
zh: 佩奇和苏茜只想自己玩。

en: I'm a tiny little fairy princess!
zh: 我是一个小小仙女公主！

en: I'm going to wave my magic wand...and turn you into a frog!
zh: 我现在要挥动我的魔法棒了。。。然后把你变成青蛙！

en: George doesn't like playing on his own.
zh: 乔治不喜欢自己一个人玩。

en: George wants to play, too.
No, George! I'm playing with Suzy...
zh: 不行，乔治！我正在和苏茜玩。。。

en: You'll have to play somewhere else.
George wants to play with Peppa.
He feels a bit lonely.
George, I need some help!!
I'm making chocolate chip cookies!!
Someone needs to lick out the bowl.
George likes helping Mummy make cookies.
zh: 乔治喜欢帮妈妈做饼干。

en: But he likes playing with Peppa more.
zh: 但他更想和佩奇一起玩。

en: I want to be a nurse!
I want to be a doctor.
But who's gonna be the sick person?
George!!!
Peppa and Suzy love playing doctors and nurses.
zh: 佩奇和苏茜喜欢扮演医生和护士。

en: So does George.
Peppa listens to George's chest.
zh: 佩奇听了下乔治的心脏。

en: Now, George, take a big breath in...then cough.
zh: 现在，乔治，深吸一口气。。。然后咳嗽。

en: Mm, I think your heart's a bit loose...
zh: 嗯，我觉得你的心跳有一点慢。。。

en: ...I'll put a plaster on it.
Open wide, please.
Suzy takes George's temperature.
Oh, dear, you're very, very hot.
zh: 哦，天啊，你的体温很高很高。

en: I think you have to stay in bed for three years.
zh: 我想你得在床上躺上三年。

en: Daddy Pig has come to find George.
Oh, no! What's wrong with George?
Don't worry, Daddy. It's only a game.
zh: 不要担心，爸爸。这只是个游戏而已。

en: George is our patient.
Oh, I see.
Can the patient have a visitor?
Just for a little while.
He might get tired.
Cookies!!!
Yes, they're for George.
They're his medicine to make him feel better.
zh: 它们是能治好乔治的药。

en: Um, excuse me, doctor,
Can you help me?
I have a sore tummy.
That tickles!
I can hear it rumbling.
I think you're hungry, Daddy.
Then I think I need lots of cookies to make me better.
zh: 我想我需要很多的饼干让我好起来。

en: And me!
And me!
And me! Baa
